SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
DECLARE @Periodo CHAR(6)
SELECT @Periodo = CAST(MAX(Id_periodo) AS CHAR(6)) from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA
/* Actualiza H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET */
INSERT INTO H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET ([id_periodo], [id_persona], [afiliado], [subnumero], [secuencia], [id_producto_origen], [id_subproducto_origen], [id_plan_origen], [id_producto_destino], [id_subproducto_destino], [id_plan_destino], [comer_cant_cambio_plan], [fecha_suscripcion], [id_reingreso], [fecha_inicio_serv], [fecha_ingreso_Sancor_Salud], [char_fecha_patologia_preexistente], [fecha_patologia_preexistente], [edad_periodo], [id_promotor], [id_datero], [id_supervisor], [id_entidad], [id_jefe_equipo], [id_cobertura], [id_categoria], [id_nro_tambo], [subgrupo_plan], [id_comercializadora], fecha_ingreso_segmento_comercial, [id_os_proveniente]) SELECT [id_periodo], [id_persona], [afiliado], [subnumero], [secuencia], [id_producto_origen], [id_subproducto_origen], [id_plan_origen], [id_producto_destino], [id_subproducto_destino], [id_plan_destino], [comer_cant_cambio_plan], [fecha_suscripcion], [id_reingreso], [fecha_inicio_serv], [fecha_ingreso_Sancor_Salud], [char_fecha_patologia_preexistente], [fecha_patologia_preexistente], [edad_periodo], [id_promotor], [id_datero], [id_supervisor], [id_entidad], [id_jefe_equipo], [id_cobertura], [id_categoria], [id_nro_tambo], [subgrupo_plan], [id_comercilizadora], fecha_ingreso_segmento_comercial, [id_os_proveniente] FROM AUX_H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET WHERE Id_Persona NOT IN (Select id_persona from BAJAS_FUTURO)
select ws6naf as afiliado, ws6saf as subnumero, ws6sec as secuencia, ws6fvp as fecha_ingreso_sancor into #temp_fecha_ingreso from as400.host03.smplibd.M06FSAL where ws6fvp <> 0 group by ws6naf, ws6saf, ws6sec,ws6fvp
-- ACTUALIZA FECHA INGRESO SALUD EN ALTAS REALES update H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET set fecha_ingreso_Sancor_Salud = null where id_periodo = @PERIODO
update H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET set fecha_ingreso_Sancor_Salud = cast(t.fecha_ingreso_sancor as varchar) from H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET h inner join #temp_fecha_ingreso t on t.afiliado = h.afiliado and t.subnumero = h.subnumero and t.secuencia = h.secuencia where h.id_periodo = @PERIODO
update H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_DET set fecha_ingreso_Sancor_Salud = '1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' where id_periodo = @PERIODO and fecha_ingreso_Sancor_Salud is null

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection
